column1: Uchi////Now this place is so good
column2: you have to know upfront what you are willing to spend. If you go all in like I did
column3: it can be more expensive than a Michelin star restaurant (I actually have eaten at Michelin star restaurants that weren't this good but that's for another day ). One of the dishes was with uuni
column4: caviar and gold leaves but so well balanced it was worth it. And then there was Wagyu A5. And then there was foie gras. And then
column7: ... oh and the sake! A very wide choice of really good sake.
